definition[0]: used to describe the total cost of something, or the total amount of money charged for something
example[0]: The hourly rate is £20 all in.
example[1]: all-in deals to Australia and New Zealand
definition[1]: an all-in rate or price is one that includes all services, parts etc, with no additional costs
example[2]: For an all-in price of £990, investors get an annual subscription as well as the hardware and software required.
